overview: Bret Varricchio is a Commercial Real Estate Broker specializing in the media and technology sectors of Manhattan. He is responsible for over 500,000 square feet of tenant representation leasing assignments. During his career, he has represented noteworthy clients such as Escada of the Americas, Great China Empire, BK Fashions, Vivienne Tam, Ask.com, World Trade Center Association, Broadway Partners, LaBranche Structured Products, and Gas Station TV (Destination Media).
